channel.title: Torva Legs
channel.description:
Can't get my torva legs right i don't know why
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/10/naamloosmm.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/2626/naamloosmm.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Torva Legs
item.dc:creator: @_sarah1 _sarah_
item.description:
@_sarah1 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:10, topic:464513”]open up the zip file and move it to your models
http://www.mediafire.com/?c5vseq2tkvnp62d

Now then go to your class8.java and search up “torva” and find your platelegs now mine looks like this

if(i == 18355) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14150; class8.anInt165 = 10110; class8.anInt200 = 14149; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1700; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 5; class8.aString170 = "Torva platelegs"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Torva platelegs".getBytes(); }

Now look at this part of your code

and make sure it the number after the equal sign is this[/quote]

Thank you very mutch !

Read full topic

item.title: Torva Legs
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

open up the zip file and move it to your models
http://www.mediafire.com/?c5vseq2tkvnp62d

Now then go to your class8.java and search up “torva” and find your platelegs now mine looks like this

if(i == 18355) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14150; class8.anInt165 = 10110; class8.anInt200 = 14149; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1700; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 5; class8.aString170 = "Torva platelegs"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Torva platelegs".getBytes(); }

Now look at this part of your code

and make sure it the number after the equal sign is this

Read full topic

item.title: Torva Legs
item.dc:creator: @_sarah1 _sarah_
item.description:
@_sarah1 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:8, topic:464513”][quote author=sarah link=topic=568538.msg4127619#msg4127619 date=1350667026]

lol me and you have the same prob maybe we should check out the model to see if its not a troll model in datmaker

i don’t think so because the helm and plate were in the same download and they are both great except for the legs
[/quote]

I just fixed mine by going into the torva folder and turning 10110 into a gzip rar adn put it in my models and complied and it worked for me[/quote]

Can you send me your gzipped legs please
they have the same ints as my legs ?

Read full topic

lol me and you have the same prob maybe we should check out the model to see if its not a troll model in datmaker
[/quote]
i don’t think so because the helm and plate were in the same download and they are both great except for the legs[/quote]

Legs Slot this is the int

if(i == 18356){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 14153;//item look class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 1100; class8.anInt198 = 650; class8.anInt204 = 1148; class8.anInt169 = 5; class8.anInt194 = -25; class8.anInt165 = 14151; class8.anInt200 = 14152; class8.aString170 = "Torva full helm "; class8.aByteArray178 = "A ancient warior's full helm.".getBytes(); }
